column4: BRIEF-Microsoft and Halliburton enter strategic alliance
column5: * Microsoft and Halliburton collaborate to digitally transform the oil and gas industry

column4: Google touts Titan security chip to market cloud services
column5: SAN FRANCISCO  Aug 22 Alphabet Inc’s Google this week will disclose technical details of its new Titan computer chip  an elaborate security feature for its cloud computing network that the company hopes will enable it to steal a march on Amazon.com Inc and Microsoft Corp.

column4: BRIEF-Intel completes subsequent offering period of tender offer for Mobileye
column5: * Intel completes subsequent offering period of tender offer for mobileye
